author: Willy
content: I tried posting the sister in laws wedding (with the wedding march) for free and youtube refosed it for copyright music. Must be something else.

author: Ryan Smith
content: Willy – I have the ability to post videos using whatever music(mostly) I want – I cant make any $ on it due to the copyright of the song but I dont care – I posted/made/filmed the Providence for Free/on my own time and dime for the crew, the folks that rebuilt her and for history.

author: Willy
content: I am wondering how they got the vid to stay on youtube using the Avengers soundtrack. As far as the boat goes, she seems tiny with only one mast.
